mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM AS TOTAL_COUNT, C.ROWNUM, C.IDX, C.PARENT_IDX, C.TITLE, C.CONTENTS, C.HIT_CNT, C.CREA_DTM, C.CREA_ID FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM LUNA_TB_BOARD WHERE DEL_GB='N' ORDER BY IDX DESC )A, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) B ) C
mapper.update: UPDATE LUNA_TB_BOARD SET HIT_CNT = COALESCE(HIT_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, HIT_CNT, CREA_ID, CREA_DTM, TITLE, CONTENTS FROM LUNA_TB_BOARD WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.update: UPDATE LUNA_TB_BOARD SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LUNA_TB_FILE ( BOARD_IDX, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREA_DTM, CREA_ID ) VALUES ( #{BOARD_IDX}, #{ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME}, #{STORED_FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_SIZE}, NOW(), 'Admin' )
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM LUNA_TB_FILE WHERE BOARD_IDX = #{IDX} AND DEL_GB = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE LUNA_TB_FILE SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_IDX = #{IDX}
